description: The optimum subscription providing you with enough service time to support the above-average user to enable your device to be up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services2GB data per month
The optimum subscription providing you with enough service time to support the above-average with data and SMS services to allow access to your device.Up to 12GB of data per year
The standard subscription providing you with enough service time to support the average user to enable your device to be up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services.Up to 1 GB data per month
The standard subscription providing you with enough service time to support the average user with Data and SMS services to allow access to your device.Up to 12GB of data per year
The basic starter subscription providing you with all you need to get your device up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services.Up to 500MB of data per month
The basic starter subscription providing you with all you need to get you up and running with Data and SMS services to allow access to your device.Up to 6GB of data per year
